channel.title: Acer Timelinex 4820tg Review on
channel.description: Recent content in Acer Timelinex 4820tg Review on

item.title: Acer TimelineX 4820TG Mini-Review
item.description: This is a small review of my Acer TimelineX 4820TG that I purchased a few days ago. Now, I won’t be talking numbers (like CPU/GPU performance etc) because these things are almost same as per the component used and have been covered in various other reviews online. What I’ll concentrate more upon are the things that other reviewers don’t look at, or look at purely from numbers perspective which don’t make sense to an average buyer.
